title: L'equilibrista Vegano
description: The first 100% vegan shop in Forli and the surrounding area. Carries a large range of Italian and international vegan products, including cheese, meat substitutes, plant based milk, nuts, chocolate, cereals, vegetable yogurts, seaweed, cookies, wine, beer, pasta, raw bars, vegetable butters, oils. Household detergents and personal care products, all vegetable based, are also for sale. A small lounge is available for anyone who would like to read vegan related magazines and books.
